content: How about "Airballs Anonymous" or "The Rim Grazers"? "The Hoopsters" or "The Court Jesters" could also be fun options. If you want something a bit more whimsical, you could go with "Dunkin' Donuts" or "Foul Play". Another idea is "The Ball Busters" or "The Swish Kebabs". Ultimately, the best name is one that reflects your team's personality and makes you all laugh.
